00013 RainbruRPG::Core::ExampleFrameListener::
00014 ExampleFrameListener( RenderWindow* win, Camera* cam, 
00015                       bool useBufferedInputKeys, 
00016                       bool useBufferedInputMouse){
00017 
00018 
00019        mUseBufferedInputKeys = useBufferedInputKeys;
00020       mUseBufferedInputMouse = useBufferedInputMouse;
00021       mInputTypeSwitchingOn = mUseBufferedInputKeys || mUseBufferedInputMouse;
00022 
00023       if (mInputTypeSwitchingOn){
00024                 mEventProcessor = new EventProcessor();
00025         mEventProcessor = EventProcessor::getSingletonPtr();
00026         mEventProcessor->initialise(win);
00027         mEventProcessor->startProcessingEvents();
00028         mEventProcessor->addKeyListener(this);
00029         mInputDevice = mEventProcessor->getInputReader();
00030       }
00031       else{
00032   
00033         mInputDevice = PlatformManager::getSingleton().createInputReader();
00034         mInputDevice->initialise(win,true, true);
00035           }
00036 
00037       mCamera = cam;
00038       mWindow = win;
00039       mStatsOn = true;
00040       mNumScreenShots = 0;
00041       mTimeUntilNextToggle = 0;
00042       mMoveScale = 0.0f;
00043       mRotScale = 0.0f;
00044       mTranslateVector = Vector3::ZERO;
00045       mAniso = 1;
00046       mFiltering = TFO_BILINEAR;
00047 }

00052 RainbruRPG::Core::ExampleFrameListener::~ExampleFrameListener(){
00053   if (mInputTypeSwitchingOn){
00054     delete mEventProcessor;
00055   }
00056   else{
00057     PlatformManager::getSingleton().destroyInputReader( mInputDevice );
00058   }
00059 }

00067 bool RainbruRPG::Core::ExampleFrameListener::
00068 processUnbufferedKeyInput(const FrameEvent& evt){
00069   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_A)){
00070     // Move camera left
00071     mTranslateVector.x = -mMoveScale;
00072   }
00073   
00074   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_D)){
00075     // Move camera RIGHT
00076     mTranslateVector.x = mMoveScale;
00077   }
00078   
00079   /* Move camera forward by keypress. */
00080   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_UP) || mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_W) ){
00081     mTranslateVector.z = -mMoveScale;
00082   }
00083   
00084   /* Move camera backward by keypress. */
00085   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_DOWN) || mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_S)){
00086     mTranslateVector.z = mMoveScale;
00087   }
00088   
00089   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_PGUP)){
00090     // Move camera up
00091     mTranslateVector.y = mMoveScale;
00092   }
00093   
00094   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_PGDOWN)){
00095     // Move camera down
00096     mTranslateVector.y = -mMoveScale;
00097   }
00098   
00099   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_RIGHT)){
00100     mCamera->yaw(-mRotScale);
00101   }
00102   
00103   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_LEFT)){
00104     mCamera->yaw(mRotScale);
00105   }
00106   
00107   if( mInputDevice->isKeyDown( KC_ESCAPE) ){            
00108     return false;
00109   }
00110   
00111   // see if switching is on, and you want to toggle 
00112   if (mInputTypeSwitchingOn && mInputDevice->
00113       isKeyDown(KC_M) && mTimeUntilNextToggle <= 0){
00114     switchMouseMode();
00115     mTimeUntilNextToggle = 1;
00116   }
00117   
00118   if (mInputTypeSwitchingOn && mInputDevice->
00119       isKeyDown(KC_K) && mTimeUntilNextToggle <= 0){
00120     // must be going from immediate keyboard to buffered keyboard
00121     switchKeyMode();
00122     mTimeUntilNextToggle = 1;
00123   }
00124   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_F) && mTimeUntilNextToggle <= 0){
00125     mStatsOn = !mStatsOn;
00126     mTimeUntilNextToggle = 1;
00127   }
00128   
00129   
00130   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_T) && mTimeUntilNextToggle <= 0){
00131     switch(mFiltering){
00132     case TFO_BILINEAR:
00133       mFiltering = TFO_TRILINEAR;
00134       mAniso = 1;
00135       break;
00136     case TFO_TRILINEAR:
00137       mFiltering = TFO_ANISOTROPIC;
00138       mAniso = 8;
00139       break;
00140     case TFO_ANISOTROPIC:
00141       mFiltering = TFO_BILINEAR;
00142       mAniso = 1;
00143       break;
00144     default:
00145       break;
00146     }
00147     MaterialManager::getSingleton().
00148       setDefaultTextureFiltering(mFiltering);
00149     MaterialManager::getSingleton().setDefaultAnisotropy(mAniso);
00150     
00151     mTimeUntilNextToggle = 1;
00152   }
00153    
00154   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_SYSRQ) && mTimeUntilNextToggle <= 0){
00155     char tmp[20];
00156     sprintf(tmp, "screenshot_%d.png", ++mNumScreenShots);
00157     mWindow->writeContentsToFile(tmp);
00158     mTimeUntilNextToggle = 0.5;
00159     //    mWindow->setDebugText(String("Wrote ") + tmp);
00160   }
00161   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_R) && mTimeUntilNextToggle <=0){
00162     mSceneDetailIndex = (mSceneDetailIndex+1)%3 ;
00163     switch(mSceneDetailIndex) {
00164     case 0 : mCamera->setPolygonMode(PM_SOLID) ; break ;
00165     case 1 : mCamera->setPolygonMode(PM_WIREFRAME) ; break ;
00166     case 2 : mCamera->setPolygonMode(PM_POINTS) ; break ;
00167     }
00168     mTimeUntilNextToggle = 0.5;
00169   }
00170   static bool displayCameraDetails = false;
00171   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_P) && mTimeUntilNextToggle <= 0){
00172     displayCameraDetails = !displayCameraDetails;
00173     mTimeUntilNextToggle = 0.5;
00174     /*    if (!displayCameraDetails)
00175       mWindow->setDebugText("");
00176     */
00177   }
00178   
00179   if (displayCameraDetails){
00180     // Print camera details
00181     /*   mWindow->setDebugText("P: " + StringConverter::
00182                           toString(mCamera->getDerivedPosition()) 
00183                           + " " + 
00184                           "O: " + StringConverter::toString(mCamera->
00185                                     getDerivedOrientation()));
00186     */
00187   }
00188   
00189   // Return true to continue rendering
00190   return true;
00191 }

00200 bool RainbruRPG::Core::ExampleFrameListener::
00201 processUnbufferedMouseInput(const FrameEvent& evt){
00202   /* Rotation factors, may not be used if the second mouse 
00203      button is pressed. */
00204   
00205   /* If the second mouse button is pressed, then the mouse 
00206      movement results in 
00207      sliding the camera, otherwise we rotate. */
00208   if( mInputDevice->getMouseButton( 1 ) ){
00209     mTranslateVector.x += mInputDevice->getMouseRelativeX() * 0.13;
00210     mTranslateVector.y -= mInputDevice->getMouseRelativeY() * 0.13;
00211   }
00212   else{
00213     mRotX = Degree(-mInputDevice->getMouseRelativeX() * 0.13);
00214     mRotY = Degree(-mInputDevice->getMouseRelativeY() * 0.13);
00215   }
00216   return true;
00217 }
00218 
00225 void RainbruRPG::Core::ExampleFrameListener::moveCamera(){
00226   mCamera->yaw(mRotX);
00227   mCamera->pitch(mRotY);
00228   mCamera->moveRelative(mTranslateVector);
00229 }

00237 bool RainbruRPG::Core::ExampleFrameListener::
00238 frameStarted(const FrameEvent& evt){
00239   if(mWindow->isClosed())
00240     return false;
00241       
00242   //  if (!mInputTypeSwitchingOn){
00243   mInputDevice->capture();
00244     //  }
00245 
00246   if ( !mUseBufferedInputMouse || !mUseBufferedInputKeys){
00247     // one of the input modes is immediate, so setup what is 
00248     // needed for immediate mouse/key movement
00249     if (mTimeUntilNextToggle >= 0) 
00250       mTimeUntilNextToggle -= evt.timeSinceLastFrame;
00251     
00252     // If this is the first frame, pick a speed
00253     if (evt.timeSinceLastFrame == 0){
00254       mMoveScale = 1;
00255       mRotScale = 0.1;
00256     }
00257     
00258     // Otherwise scale movement units by time passed since last frame
00259     else{
00260       // Move about 100 units per second,
00261       mMoveScale = mMoveSpeed * evt.timeSinceLastFrame;
00262       // Take about 10 seconds for full rotation
00263       mRotScale = mRotateSpeed * evt.timeSinceLastFrame;
00264     }
00265     mRotX = 0;
00266     mRotY = 0;
00267     mTranslateVector = Vector3::ZERO;
00268   }
00269   
00270 
00271     if (processUnbufferedKeyInput(evt) == false){
00272       return false;
00273     }
00274   
00275   
00276    if (processUnbufferedMouseInput(evt) == false){
00277       return false;
00278     }
00279   
00280     moveCamera();
00281     
00282   return true;
00283 }

00288 void RainbruRPG::Core::ExampleFrameListener::switchMouseMode(){
00289   mUseBufferedInputMouse = !mUseBufferedInputMouse;
00290   mInputDevice->setBufferedInput(mUseBufferedInputKeys, 
00291                                  mUseBufferedInputMouse);
00292 }
00293 
00297 void RainbruRPG::Core::ExampleFrameListener::switchKeyMode(){
00298   mUseBufferedInputKeys = !mUseBufferedInputKeys;
00299   mInputDevice->setBufferedInput(mUseBufferedInputKeys, 
00300                                  mUseBufferedInputMouse);
00301 }
00302 
00308 void RainbruRPG::Core::ExampleFrameListener::keyClicked(KeyEvent* e){
00309   if (e->getKeyChar() == 'm'){
00310     switchMouseMode();
00311   }
00312   else if (e->getKeyChar() == 'k'){
00313     switchKeyMode();
00314   }
00315 }
